scripts.start: npm run one & npm run two & google-chrome-stable --disable-web-security --user-data-dir=~/tmp --disable-site-isolation-trails
scripts.extension: npm run two & web-ext run -t chromium --chromium-binary /usr/bin/google-chrome-stable --arg="--disable-web-security" --arg="--user-data-dir=~/tmp" --arg="--disable-site-isolation-trails" --start-url "about:blank"
